thread.title: Laura

author: Laura
title: Laura
text:
First, i must say that the shipping and tracking was fabolous, and then, the glory, girls, your packaging is awesome and delicious!
The dress is so nice, fits almost perfectly to my figure, and i can't wait to wear it properly!! (If you have a slightly up butt and narrow waist there can be a bit of leftover fabric in the back, but this is a current problem if the fabric is not elastic ;) )
Thank your very much!!!
